io.polestar.api

Interface IPolestarContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.INKFBasicContext, org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.INKFLocale, org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.INKFParameters, org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.INKFRequestContext, IPolestarAPI

    public interface IPolestarContext
extends org.netkernel.layer0.nkf.INKFRequestContext, IPolestarAPI
    Both IPolestarAPI and INKFRequestContext - this is what each script receives as it's context object
